body:
Who is your favorite Avicus player and why?
Mine would be IzJustAPickax. He is unfortunatly leaving Avicus forever. He would always be there for me if people were making fun of how much of a noob I was on Avicus. If someone would keep bothering me, Iz would somehow shut them up. He would be a great friend in combat and when your playing. He would always keep your spirit up when your down or just to make you laugh xD. We <3 Iz, good luck in life buddy.
In Iz we trust, In Bacca we must!

title: Who's your favorite Avicus player and why?

replies.body:
Vlad, Gallant, Centeralking, Zaidms, etc.

Vlad- Even though he reks me with his OP ping and 60 fps, he really says sorry about the ping and never brags. Really fun person to be around with.

Gallant- Friends since like forever, really funny guy and even though he thinks hes bad, hes pretty good.

Centeralking- Nuff said. :3

Zaidms, rEx0r, dosent brag. I used to have fun with him, telling him hes 2 good and for him to stahp, but he kept on. At one point I got better and now I can beat him, and he can beat me, in PvP.

Centeralking- Nuff said. :3

Zaidms, rEx0r, dosent brag. I used to have fun with him, telling him hes 2 good and for him to stahp, but he kept on. At one point I got better and now I can beat him, and he can beat me, in PvP.

replies.body:
Sevo, Liquidators, Most of the Staff team, Zaid, my MCZone randy group (DrPhil and I are the only ones left..), Cyneric, SilverWolf, Map Devs, ColdCraft, Sethskye, Seuth, and a bunch of others :)

They're all really nice guys who can't stop having fun <3

replies.body:
MLGPorky - First friend I ever had on the server, back when I was a30ngamingz140. He's actually caused me to be a lot less introverted on the network.

goldenwalrus909 - Perhaps the least serious person on the network, as the one time I Skype called him so far, he laughed so many times. Btw, not being serious is hardly a bad trait in my eyes, if that's what you were thinking :)

Petlas - So happy I met you. SO happy. Although our friendship only started recently, I have a feeling it's gonna last a long time since we made that 50-minute Skype call to each other. Only thing is that we're hardly online at the same time! Anyways, you're still awesome, and I'd definitely enjoy talking again :D

I'm terribly sorry if I forgot you, but if I did include everyone I wanted to talk about, my post would probably take 15 minutes to read. xD
replies.body_tagged:
MLGPorky - First friend I ever had on the server, back when I was a30ngamingz140. He's actually caused me to be a lot less introverted on the network.

goldenwalrus909 - Perhaps the least serious person on the network, as the one time I Skype called him so far, he laughed so many times. Btw, not being serious is hardly a bad trait in my eyes, if that's what you were thinking :)

Petlas - So happy I met you. SO happy. Although our friendship only started recently, I have a feeling it's gonna last a long time since we made that 50-minute Skype call to each other. Only thing is that we're hardly online at the same time! Anyways, you're still awesome, and I'd definitely enjoy talking again :D

I'm terribly sorry if I forgot you, but if I did include everyone I wanted to talk about, my post would probably take 15 minutes to read. xD
